full_summary:
===============

### Title
Janitorial Services at the Saint-Fidèle Visitor Centre, Pointe-Noire Interpretation Centre, and Wharf at Baie-Sainte-Catherine

#### Reference Number
PW-23-01020097

#### Tender Details
- **Publication Date:** January 4, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** January 31, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method:** Open bidding
- **Notice Language:** English and French

#### Tender Description
Parks Canada requires janitorial services at the Saint-Fidèle Visitor Centre, Pointe-Noire Interpretation Centre, and Wharf at Baie-Sainte-Catherine. The contract period is for one year, starting from May 1, 2023, with the possibility of two additional one-year periods for the 2024 and 2025 seasons. The contractor must provide all necessary equipment, cleaning supplies, and personal protective equipment.

#### Requirements and Assumptions
- **Site Visit:** A site visit is recommended for bidders to familiarize themselves with the work environment. The site visit will be held on January 12, 2023, at the Wharf at Baie-Sainte-Catherine. Bidders are required to confirm their attendance and provide the names of the personnel attending the visit.
- **Security Clearances:** A security clearance may be required for contractors performing the work. The costs associated with the clearance are the responsibility of the contractor.
- **Bid Submissions:** Bids must be submitted through email or fax, as specified in the solicitation documents. In-person submissions and submissions via SAP Ariba are not accepted.
- **Bid Evaluation:** Bids will be evaluated based on the contractor's past experience, technical capabilities, and ability to meet the contract requirements.

#### Important Notice
- **Deadlines:** All queries and communicating with the Contracting Authority must be done in writing, at least five working days before the tender closing date.
- **Security and Confidentiality:** The contractor must comply with the National Parks Regulations and maintain the confidentiality of the work performed.

#### Communication and Contact Information
- **Contact Name:** Marie-Michelle Mazerolle-Losier
- **Contact Email:** [marie-michelle.mazerolle-losier@pc.gc.ca](mailto:marie-michelle.mazerolle-losier@pc.gc.ca)
- **Contact Phone:**
